CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.6a, lastmenstrualdateformat (3N) --> Value should be 102 AND B.1.6b, lastmenstrualdate (8N) --> convert to CCYYMMDD
E2B (R3): D.6 Last Menstrual Period Date Conformance: Optional Data Type: Date / Time OID: None Value Allowed: See Appendix II for further information. nullFlavor: MSK
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This data element captures the date of the last menstrual period of the patient when it is relevant.
CustomField.label: Patient Last Menstrual Period
